bike.description: 6061 aluminum main tubes, over-sized seat tube, replaceable derailleur hanger
bike.paint_description: M: Gloss Black or Ano Grey   F: Pearl White

components.description: RST Gila-T, alloy crown & lowers, coil spring with external preload adjustor, 28mm stanchions, 80mm travel
Double-wall DA-16 alloy rims, 36H, heavy-duty ATB hubs with QR, 14g black electro-plated spokes
Shimano Tourney TX-55 rear and TX51 front
ATB platform, hi-impact resin cage & body
Alloy linear pull type with Shimano alloy levers
Jamis XC riser, 6JAMIS_DEGREE sweep x 13mm rise x 620mm
Jamis XC threadless with alloy cap, 10JAMIS_DEGREE rise x 90mm (12-15"), 100mm (17-18"), 110mm (19") and 120mm (21")
Jamis ATB Sport with pressure relief channel, SL cover, protective front and rear guards
